sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A short and briefe summe of saving knowledge consisting of the creed, ten Commandements, Lords prayer and the sacraments. And is made profitable introduction to the larger art of divinitie, composed by the methodicall tables of A.R. and published by I.Y. Yates, John, d. ca. 1660.
[32] p.
Printed by I. D[awson] for Fulke Clifton, and are to be sold under St. Margrets Church on Fish-streete hill, London : 1621.
I.Y. = John Yates. A catechism. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B. Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
=======

[32] p.
Printed by I. D[awson] for Fulke Clifton, and are to be sold under St. Margrets Church on Fish-streete hill, London : 1621.
I.Y. = John Yates. A catechism. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-B. Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
Fulke Clifton
I. D[awson]
Fish-streete hill
